definition: Friendship Store, PRC state-run store originally intended for foreigners, diplomats etc, specializing in selling imported Western goods and quality Chinese crafts
commerce/merchant/dealer/to consult/2nd note in pentatonic scale/quotient (as in 智商[zhi4 shang1], intelligence quotient)

sentences.english: The Friendship Store is near the hotel.
sentences.chinese: 友谊商店在酒店的附近。

sentences.english: And they were available only in special shops, like the Friendship Store.
sentences.chinese: 并且只能从象“友谊商店”这样的特殊商店才能买到。

sentences.english: Excuse me, could you show me the way to the Friendship Department Store?
sentences.chinese: 劳驾，您能告诉我友谊商店在哪里吗？

sentences.english: I bought it in the Friendship Store .
Excuse me. Is this where I can catch the bus to the Friendship Store?
sentences.chinese: 请问，去友谊商店是在这儿上车吗？

sentences.english: At the corner of the street, you will find the shop.
sentences.chinese: 在街道拐角处，你就会看见友谊商店了。

sentences.english: Shoping in World trade Center & friendship store Taojin Road Guangzhou with my love Kate.
sentences.chinese: 和淑芬一起到淘金路世界贸易中心，友谊商店逛逛。

sentences.english: Just turn left at the Friendship Store and Ritan Park is straight ahead.
sentences.chinese: 就在友谊商店向左拐，日坛公园就在前面。

sentences.english: Just turn left at the Friendship Store over there.
sentences.chinese: 在那边的友谊商店左转就可以。

sentences.english: I think the Friendship Store sells special items to foreigners .
sentences.chinese: 我想友谊商店有专门向外宾出售的商品。

sentences.english: Along Changan Avenue, opposite the Friendship Store.
sentences.chinese: 位于长安街，正对友谊商店。

definition: shopping mall/shopping center/department store/emporium/CL:家[jia1]/the business world
CR Vanguard or China Resources Vanguard Shop, a supermarket chain in Hong Kong and mainland China
Great Wall Hotel (Beijing Sheraton 喜來登|喜来登)
